A

Account - Class in Class
Class that gives user account functionality such as registration, login confirmation, account settings, and to save flight reservations.
Account() - Constructor for class Class.Account
Empty Constructor method used to register accounts
Account(String, String, String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class Class.Account
Constructor Method used to register accounts
accountExists(String) - Static method in class Class.Account
Method that confirms if account already exists
addReservation(Reservation) - Static method in class Class.Account
Method that adds one or more flight reservations to user's account.
Airline - Class in Class
The Airline class is used in conjunction with information recollected from the API used in this project.
Airline() - Constructor for class Class.Airline
Constructor that is empty, at the moment.
Airline(String, String) - Constructor for class Class.Airline
Method for setting a new Airline and set its properties.

The Airport class is used in conjunction with information recollected from the API used in this project.

API - package API
 
ApiClient - Class in API
The ApiClient class is used to send http requests to AeroAPI for real-time flight data including scheduled departures, airport lists, and airline operator names in JSON format.
ApiClient(String) - Constructor for class API.ApiClient
Constructor Method that takes url String for API request
